text: Simone Veil, DBE (; 13 July 1927 - 30 June 2017) was a French lawyer and politician. She served as Minister of Health under Valéry Giscard d'Estaing, President of the European Parliament and member of the Constitutional Council of France. She was awarded the Grand Cross of the Légion D'Honneur in 2012. She was of Jewish descent and survived the Holocaust. Veil died in Paris on 30 June 2017, aged 89.Simone Veil est décédée à 89 ans, Le Journal du Dimanche, 30 June 2017 ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1927 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Abortion-rights activists Category:Christian democrats Category:French lawyers Category:Government ministers of France Category:Holocaust survivors Category:Jewish activists Category:Jewish French politicians Category:Jewish lawyers Category:Jewish politicians Category:Recipients of the Order of the Legion of Honour Category:MEPs for France Category:Politicians from Nice Category:Presidents of the European Parliament
title: Simone Veil
